website_summaries.verdict: Popular choice for parties or small group art projects. Good mid-range choice for beginning crafters.
pros: Does not require a pre-soaking in soda ash, but we still recommend it for better results
Dye colors mix with water, can be combined
All-inclusive kit includes protective tarp, gloves, and storage bottles
cons: Bottles are not as large as advertised
Finished colors may be muted, fade quickly in wash. Dyes can run without a soda ash soaking

customer_reviews.title: Worked Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These colors were just perfect for the projects we did. They covered at least 10 shirts, maybe even more. (We dyed a lot but had another small dye kit, as well) I especially liked the turquoise and violet colors, that don't come in some other kits. We were also able to use just the powder on a few shirts to do an ice dye technique.
customer_reviews.author: Tracking Packages

customer_reviews.title: The dye was very simple to prepare and even grown adult men enjoyed it. Had just enough dye to tie-dyed 15 ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a coworker's office baby shower. The dye was very simple to prepare and even grown adult men enjoyed it. Had just enough dye to tie-dyed 15 onsies.
customer_reviews.author: Roy W.

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a decent kit bc Tulip is such a big name. I was hoping to save some money but the dye (especially the blue and black) ended up bleeding into EVERYTHING. ALL our shirts came out blue where the white should be. I’ve done some really cool spirals and designs with past tie dye experiments. You can still achieve the spirals and bullseyes but the colors bleed into each other. I can’t recommend Tulip but I’ve used Dharma Trading company a handful of times and their dyes and products are AWESOME! They are a little more expensive but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: RChambers

customer_reviews.title: Good price for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Good price for what you get. There are plenty of rubber bands. Each bottle really dyes a lot of pieces. Plenty to go around if doing multiples. We didn't mix the bottle with water until someone wanted to use that particular color. We have bottles that weren't used and saving for next time. When putting the dye on, sometimes less is more, as the saying goes. If you put a lot of dye, like some of ours were done, you still have tye dye, but the colors reach one another and there isn't any white left on the garment.
customer_reviews.author: tishall99

customer_reviews.title: Great activity with kids
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids (6, 10 and 12) and I had a blast making tye-dye shirts. I have a few suggests: 1. The gloves that come with the kit are HUGE. You may want to get small disposable gloves. 2. If you have more than 2 people tye-dying at the same time you will want a larger drop cloth. 3. This product with make a ton of projects. We did 7 shirts and still had a ton of dye left. The shirts came out great!
customer_reviews.author: psh34

customer_reviews.title: Could be a lot better
customer_reviews.text: This product is too expensive for what you're actually getting. It says it can dye 30+ shirts but once you mix the dye you have to use it within 45 minutes and it doesn't come with any refill packets. If tie dying is something you want to get into, I would just buy the powder and bottles yourself. Also, it doesn't come with soda ash to presoak your shirts. The dye is not very good and looks faded after washing. This kit may be fun for like a kids party or something but not for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Great vibrant colors!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit to tie dye onesies that my eldest daughter used (and stained) for upcycled onesies for my son. I just did a few to start and can’t wait to do more! I did 14 or so onesies with just three bottles of dye. Still have some left in those bottles and plenty more can be done with the other colors I haven’t used yet. Make sure to wet all your clothes you plan to dye before twisting them up to ensure that you don’t waste any of the color and get the most vibrant results. Also, let them set in the ziplock bags for at least 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I love these kits from Tulip and they sell them in the Walmart by my house but I can usually get a better deal on amazon and I think this kit is the best value because it’s nice having bigger bottles of each color instead of more colors because once you start making them you see colors you like and want to use and the biggest issue is they go too quickly so my advice is find the colors you like and get bigger bottles of those colors instead of buying little bottles with a million different colors. Also it’s easiest to do these outside and it makes clean up much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Enough colors for everyone to find what they like.
customer_reviews.text: 12 colors! How could this not be fun? We were able to do a dozen tie-dye projects and still had plenty of the dye left over for at least another 6. Great variety, everyone found colors they liked and no 2 projects looked alike. Note: you will probably want to get additional rubber bands. There never seem to be enough for us.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Great For Hobby, Maybe Not For Business
customer_reviews.text: I'm overall impressed how well this dye worked. Colors are brilliant if done right and this kit offers a wide variety of colors for pairing. For beginners, this is a great set. For people looking to do this professionally, this kit would not work for you and would need to buy additional items. I was surprised how little the bottles were, was hoping for more of each color so had to buy a second kit. Includes bottles, dye packets, rubberbands, and very little soda ash. Does not include Nitrogen.
customer_reviews.author: jason sparks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The instructions where nice and easy. Great color options and I liked that it came with gum bands, gloves and a plastic table cloth. Definitely will buy again once I'm done using all the colors. The package isn't super well made in that it was open when I got it. So I understand the complaints about that and people that bought it as a gift. But nothing in my order was damaged. After dying. I let it set for 12 hours. Hand rinsed in cold water. Hung to dry. Hand rinsed in hot water then directly in to washing machine cold cold cold no soap. They held color very well! Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived half open
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet because I got it for my daughter for Christmas but it arrived half opened. It must have been returned which is not a good sign. Seems like nothing is missing but I won't know until she opens it. Hopefully everything is there and in working order. If everything turns out good, I will report back and change my rating
customer_reviews.author: Kyli

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I docked it one star because the bottles are big and once you mix the water with the colors they recommend you use it right away because the color will start to fade in time. So basically its a one use type thing. What we did was get a spare bottle, dump a little powder in and add water, this way we could use more powder another time. It has a nice pamplet with how to's, it includes rubber bands and gloves. The colors are great and I like the variety of colors along with the price.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Everything you could want for several articles of clothing.
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of colors in here that gave us some great options for making shirts. We had great luck mixing them together to make muted, secondary colors which are not usually seen on tie dye clothing. The kit recommends using the dye within 40 minutes of mixing, but we found the mixed dye viable even after a month.
customer_reviews.author: Mikul

customer_reviews.title: Easy. Fun. Comes with everything you need!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is fantastic. Easy set-up, clear directions, good quality product. We used 5 colors to make 6 shirts and there was probably enough dye left to make another 12. The color is vibrant and I love that the kit came with everything needed to have fun and keep things mess-free.
customer_reviews.author: Lee G

customer_reviews.title: Fun family activity
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit to use with my family. There was plenty dye though the claim on the package seems a bit high. We dyed 7 T-shirts and 4 tote bags and there was still some dye left over, probably enough for one or two more shirts. This kit is ready to use and produces very vibrant colors. I was very impressed with how bright the colors came out. The bottles do tend to leak, so be very careful when shaking and when removing the caps. Definitely use the included gloves and plastic table cover!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First time tye dying definitely ordering again!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit to use with my nieces and nephews. 3 years-9 years old. We did ten t-shirts 6 pairs of socks 4 hoodies and some masks and had enough color. We watched YouTube videos for the patterns.. so much fun! Just be ready for a mess!!! Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: YES
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old son and I decided to do a fun project and tye dye some shirts! Tulip color comes with easy instructions and the color is very potent. I have washed our shirts a few times already and they have yet to fade. I would recommend this brand forsure.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend and we recently tye dyed a bunch of shirt and they all turned out super cute. Each bottle of dye can partially do 2 shirts if that makes sense. We used three colors on each shirt and we did six shirts and we could each use one color once.
customer_reviews.author: janco

customer_reviews.title: We love TieDye!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great kit to use for a tiedyeing party we had! The colors are vibrant and have remained vibrant and colorful through at least the first few washes. Obviously each bottle is relatively small so you don’t get a ton of each color, but we were able to tie dye ~10 men’s size small/medium shirts and a few kids dresses.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Great family gift
customer_reviews.text: Great variety of colors. Easy to do. Much preparation is recommended. The disposable gloves that come with it should not be used if you plan on doing more than one item. They don't hold up well. Wash at least 3 times before washing with other items, will bleed out if not. Kids loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave8105

customer_reviews.title: Fun but needs better instructions
customer_reviews.text: Super fun, but vague instructions. Look for online tutorials. Definitely not ready in the time they suggest, unless you want it super faded after wash. I do like that they show different ways to dye the shirt. Do NOT use inside, it is super messy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Fun & So Easy
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why I never did this, but I can tell you it is so much fun and super easy to make an awesome shirt. Pictured is my very first tie dye T-shirt and it looks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jim G.

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Not my first time using a product like this. Made sure to SHAKE them very well. And the pink, red, orange, and one of the blues left...spotting on every piece they were used on.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great kit. Lots of colors. I do wish the colors weren’t kept in the bottles. Once the colors are mixed with water you have to use all of it(no saving for later use). It would’ve been nice to only have to mix what i was going to use rather than wasting the whole color for just one thing.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Fun activity
customer_reviews.text: We got these for the kids. One of the activities we did over Christmas break. The plastic mat it comes with is a little small. I would recommend buying a larger one if you have more than a couple of kids joining in.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Okitkun

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal compared to other stores or online sites. Products work well. You can add more water about halfway through use to make more die, but the color does get lighter at that point. Great quality and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Best kit to do a wide range of dyes.
customer_reviews.text: We make a ton of different shirts with this kit. we love tye dying and this kit has so many different colors we had so much dye left over!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy LaDucer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Wear gloves that are included as it will dye your hands. Works wonderful on cotton t-shirts. Did a project with grand kids. Turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Dale

customer_reviews.title: 36 socks maybe... but good.
customer_reviews.text: The colors were bright and stayed true through 2 washes so far. Very very easy to use! My only complaint is that this dye doesn’t cover as much as you think it will. This set did about a dozen adult t-shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Lynn Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this tie dye kit! It came with just about everything we needed. The kids loved the variety of colors and the amount of stuff they dyed with.
customer_reviews.author: Trinh

customer_reviews.title: FUN, GREAT RESULTS & EASY CLEAN-UP
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift to a friend's daughter in California. She and her BFF had so much fun working with the colors and various techniques. They are ecstatic over the results! I'm going to buy 2 kits. One for me and my wife. The other for our two granddaughters. Can't wait!
customer_reviews.author: Long Time Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Kid project pack
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, great price. Colors are quite strong - but not perfect. But better than expected. Comes with a great amount of directions and ideas. I recommend buying extra rubberbands.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hinkley

customer_reviews.title: Summertime activity
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge hit with my kids. We did 4 shirts and still have plenty of dye left for more. The colors turned out great...I did have blue hands for a few days because the gloves are not great but it was fun.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: I had lots of leftover dye.
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but the company should consider providing something to save leftover liquid dye. Otherwise, it works like a charm and includes directions and all the things you need. It would be best for a large project, but for a shirt or two, you waste so much dye not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique

customer_reviews.title: Great color selection
customer_reviews.text: These kits are fun for the entire family, ages 4-89. The colors are beautiful and vibrant. Three kits were more than enough to dye shits for our family of 30.
customer_reviews.author: Popapotamus

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is easy to use, has everything you need, and makes lots of shirts. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy B Cruse

customer_reviews.title: Cool Shirts
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised, This kit has a good color selecting. We made 6 shirts, but had enough die to make twice that many. Tip: buy some good fitting latex gloves and apply the die outside on a screened table, over grass. It's a messing process and the tie stays on your hands until you wear it off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works great for a party
customer_reviews.text: This works great for a party, and the colors were fantastic. Really we all loved it and having and extra variety of colors made it even better. However, buy an additional plastic cover for the surface your working on, because the one included is small (6ft by 8ft if that). And we (group of 6 people) were able to dye about 10 garments (a mixture of shirts, tank tops, and socks) so even though it says it will dye 36 items, that's a significant overestimation.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Kids will love
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved it and seemed to be a great deal for the money. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Daryn Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Funny time with great results
customer_reviews.text: My girls (6,4,2) all loved making tie dye shirts with their friends. We had them all do their shirts before going to an amusement park so it was easy to find everyone. The 2 year old needed help but the other kids did a good job on their own and it wasn't messy at all since to bottle were included. Colors came out bright and didn't run
customer_reviews.author: C.Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Have fun with this.
customer_reviews.text: I had fun making shirts for the family. Easy to use and has all you need. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jkauser

customer_reviews.title: Horrible waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I've tie dyed many times over the years, and decided to try a new brand besides Rit (which was out). Bad choice. The bottles leak through the flimsy plastic around the screw neck and ruined our project. And it wasn't just one, it was all of them. We had to throw them all away (waste of $30) and the t shirts we were working on. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: M. Leyes

customer_reviews.title: I loved this set
customer_reviews.text: I loved this set. Just add water and the dye's ready to go. The colors came out beautifully and complimented each other nicely. It came with easy to follow instructions & tips, rubber bands, gloves (8 pairs), and a plastic bag or two to put your shirts in while they dry. It's a great kit. Also, they say to use the dyes very soon after adding water or they'll lose vibrancy. That seems to be somewhat true but it doesn't mean the extra is worthless. I left older dye on a little longer and it just makes for a slightly diluted, but not horribly faded look.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Esso

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages
customer_reviews.text: This was a great value. It works well and all packaging was in place upon arrival. This product is fun for people of all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit. I bought the soda ash and used it together. Made 2 hoodies and they came out very vibrant
customer_reviews.author: Ericca

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Lots of artistic fun with very little effort. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: One oftie dye kit out there!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best tie dye kits out there! Very easy to use and excellent instructions!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Package torn open...
customer_reviews.text: This came completely opened. Was new item confused as to why it appears to be used.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Ecklof

customer_reviews.title: Kit came open!
customer_reviews.text: My kit came completely open. Looks like someone used half of it and put it back in the package then sold it to me for full price. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, easy way to tie-dye!
customer_reviews.text: This kit was fantastic! I can't believe how much easier tie-dying is now compared to when I was a kid. Of course it didn't make as many shirts as they say but the directions made it easy to make all kinds of patterns and they all turned out really well even though I felt uncertain while I was making them. We didn't do anything unusual before washing (besides rinse a lot!) and the color didn't fade at all. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Dyed 16 Girl Scout shirts with this kit and has some left over. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: It's always fun to tie dye and this set it perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's always fun to tie dye and this set it perfect! We only needed to do a couple of shirts for a walk and ended up just finding a bunch of other things to tie dye. We did about it 8 adult shirts, 4 toddler, 4 juniors and 6 onsies. We still had dye left over that we ended up throwing away. So much dye for a good pricd!
customer_reviews.author: MJDRCC

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: The bottles size is smaller than I thought but still a great deal
customer_reviews.author: Pink Drop

customer_reviews.title: BEST VALUE! Compared to Joann's
customer_reviews.text: We got four application uses out of this kit. So much fun & so simple to use!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Party On, Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product and the bottles make tie dying possible for young kids with some adult help (3-5 year olds). As long as you follow the instructions (I let our shirts sit at least 24 hrs before rinsing) the colors come out vibrant and withstand future washes really well. No soda ash needed but you do definitely want to prewash new shirts and start with damp fabric. Super fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this comes with everything you need! Made about 10 shirts!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah keith

customer_reviews.title: Loved this!
customer_reviews.text: We used this kit to tie dye at my daughter's 5th bday party. We did about 8 kids shirts and 10 adults. We had enough left for probably 2 more shirts. The dye is really vibrant and was easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: tmgran

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I tye dyed a dozen t-shirts for Christmas and they turned out great, we used two kits. The colors were bright and vivid. Would buy this kit again it is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Lots of colors
customer_reviews.text: Super easy way to do tie die. Less mess and variety of colors that came with great instructions.
customer_reviews.author: t4

customer_reviews.title: but I didn't 8 shirts and all the colors were pretty much gone
customer_reviews.text: This product specifically says that it will do a lot of projects (I forget the specific number), but I didn't 8 shirts and all the colors were pretty much gone. And it said they would do way more than 8. We didn't over use or over saturate or anything. The dye still worked great and was easy to use. Just the amount of shirts it did was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Macomber

customer_reviews.title: Great colors
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I did shirts together. It was super easy with the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: My kids and nieces/nephews love making shirts towels etc. Lots of fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.author: AKjos

customer_reviews.title: Dye away
customer_reviews.text: The product was nice my only complaint was the box was damaged all the bottles and products fell out. I'm pretty laid back so I just put everything back in the package and taped it up. My kids don't care how it's packed they only care about dying their shirts. We did 19 shirts with this kit 7-3/4t 7-7/8boys 5-2/3t
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Got it fast and got exactly what I was supposed to get
customer_reviews.author: Mike Gilliam

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The bottles are decent size it comes in most colors and it last a while I've had a shirt with the same brand from 4 years ago it's not as bright as it was but the color is still there
customer_reviews.author: Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it yet but it’s sooo me! I’m pretty sure I’m gonna love it! Got some white wheels to go with it can’t wait to dye them!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and money value
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this case she used it for a project with her friend in high school it was really easy to work with they loved soooo much I recommend this beautiful product 100%
customer_reviews.author: yesenia vargas

customer_reviews.title: Loved this product!
customer_reviews.text: We made 20 shirts with this kit. We have 4 kids and 2 adults making them. They turned out great and we had an absolute blast.
customer_reviews.author: Cadamudi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Great purchase and kids of all ages loved!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Kids had a blast! Kit comes with everything minus the t shirts, so order separately and make sure they are 100% cotton!
customer_reviews.author: KitKat 19

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Did a tie dye onesie party after my baby shower got 15 onesies and one swaddle blanket out of it. Super fun easy and clean
customer_reviews.author: suzi

customer_reviews.title: Tulip 12 piece dye set
customer_reviews.text: I have used the 3-6 piece sets and wanted a larger set. I do tie dyeing for many people. Sometimes it's too inconvient to set up the professional dyes the Tulip dyes do well for the small jobs.
customer_reviews.author: B. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Fun activity for the family
customer_reviews.text: This was great came with everything you need, gloves, rubber bands and the dye. Which are in individual squirt bottles, that we saved to maybe reuse. Good colors too
customer_reviews.author: Justin Feinstein

customer_reviews.title: Bottles leak but still great fun!
customer_reviews.text: Leaks when you mix with water and stains fingers for a day but overall great fun for my 5 year old and 2 year old.
customer_reviews.author: dee24

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: It's messy BUT it's so much fun! I bought this for an outdoor activity during this quarantine and my kids had so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Tye Dye Fun
customer_reviews.text: I like the colors and ease of use with this kit. The Dye is so fun!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy I.

customer_reviews.title: 🌈
customer_reviews.text: Nice colors. I always use this brand for tie dying
customer_reviews.author: Luna Rose

customer_reviews.title: Lots of colors to choose from and easy to prepare the dye
customer_reviews.text: Lots of colors to choose from and easy to prepare the dye. You have to use it within 45 minutes of making the dye. There are not that many rubber bands. The colors came out very vibrant and have lasted through several washes so far. My daughter loves her shirt. I wish I could find a refill kit for this on Amazon, as I haven't been able to locate anything except individual color refills.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin L Milam

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Came fast and easy to read instructions and comes with everything you need just have to buy the white shirts
customer_reviews.author: Bria Plair

customer_reviews.title: Nice little dye set
customer_reviews.text: Nice little dye set. Good quality. Vibrant colors. Dyed more than I thought it would. Would buy again. Would reccomend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome and lots of it for many wonderful projects. I will definitely be buying this again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Quality dye
customer_reviews.text: We used this kit for a birthday party, with four adults and three kids. I think we dyed about 15 pieces, mostly the grownups. We had Dr to spare after that. The applicator was simple to use for all ages. All our dye set well in our garments. Fun times.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nester

customer_reviews.title: My kit came with 2 oranges and no pink
customer_reviews.text: I've used tulip dyes with good results, but the warm colored dyes fade easily so in order to get deep reds and yellows you have to add less water. It works well, but you don't get as much out of it. Also the kit I received came with two orange dyes and no fuchsia
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Great tie-dye set
customer_reviews.text: Great tie-dye set. Purchased for a Christmas gift and our daughter couldn't be happier. Plenty of dye to do several shirts
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tye dye fun
customer_reviews.text: Great fun for the kids great failure for the money tye dye is great
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Bach Party APPROVED
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a tie dye station for a bach party and we did a total of 16 shirts and had some still left over! I will suggest getting more gloves an rubber bands.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great! We tie dyed 7 kids shirts and have ...
customer_reviews.text: Great! We tie dyed 7 kids shirts and have some colors left over. Next time I'll wear gloves when washing the dye out of the shirts. My hands were a lovely shade of smurf blue for days.
customer_reviews.author: scott zwarych

customer_reviews.title: Only problem with the 12 was 2 colors were brown and another color you wouldn't want to use so I felt like by buying the 12 colors ot was really only ...
customer_reviews.text: The kit is gteat, colors are bright even after a few wash. Only problem with the 12 was 2 colors were brown and another color you wouldn't want to use so I felt like by buying the 12 colors ot was really only 10 to use. I would recommend this kit though definitely.
customer_reviews.author: T AMAZONIA Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for group fun!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this pack! Was enough for our family to use on shirts and cloth diapers (6 adult shirts, 7 kid shirts, three baby shirts and several flour sack towels). Simple instructions and the colors held well!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for a great price
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely loved this kit! We made six shirts and six onesies and still had more than half of the kit leftover! Save the bottles!
customer_reviews.author: Krystle

customer_reviews.title: Wish I bought more
customer_reviews.text: Great! Everyone loved this so much I wish I'd bought 2.
customer_reviews.author: Tobias

customer_reviews.title: beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: These work wonders, I just made 2 tie dye shirts yesterday and they look beautiful! The only problem is that you can probably only make 2-3 shirts out of these.
customer_reviews.author: Luana

customer_reviews.title: It was ok
customer_reviews.text: I wish it would have saturated the shirts better, but it was still ok
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Belk

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but a bit messy.
customer_reviews.text: I recommend using your own latex gloves. But the colors came out great on my infant onesies.
customer_reviews.author: Starr

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: I have had so much fun making tye dye stuff. And the amount I paid was way better than any store price!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy  Dean

customer_reviews.title: Fun family project
customer_reviews.text: This set is wonderful! The kids and I made tie dye boxers for my husband and they turned out so good!
customer_reviews.author: Bryant Smith

customer_reviews.title: Bottles come leaking out
customer_reviews.text: Some of the containers were spilled open when I received them like they were closed correctly during packaging and some of the die fell out while being moved around
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, hours of fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The squirt bottles make it very easy, especially for little hands, to engage in this activity. The color held very well, instructions were helpful, and we made a bunch of really cute t-shirts! Having the rubberbands and gloves all included was also very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: OutdoorsyMom

customer_reviews.title: Good for a quick dye job!
customer_reviews.text: Product is great, definitely need the gloves! Pictures were helpful for designs.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Fun summer project!
customer_reviews.text: I think it will be great! I accidentally got 2 shipped to me...I keep trying to check my order but I think I only ordered 1.... I don't know how to contact the seller
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Tulip One-Step Tie-Dye Kit Super Big 12 Colors
product_meta.description: The Tulip One-Step 12-Color Tie-Dye Kit includes all of the tie-dye supplies you need to make your tie-dye activities pop with over-the-top color and creativity! Stocked with 12 bottles of vibrant One-Step Dye, supplies and an inspiration guide, this kit gives you easy access to tons of tie-dye fun. Includes everything you need except the T-shirt!
feature_bullets: Kit includes enough tie-dye supplies for 4 people
Features 12 easy-squeeze bottles of highly-concentrated nontoxic One-Step dyes in popular colors – just add water to activate
No need to presoak fabrics in soda ash before dyeing
Includes step-by-step technique guide featuring over 8 tie-dye looks to choose from
Dyes are safe to machine wash – colors stay bright and bold through repeated washings
Use with 100% natural fiber fabrics like cotton, rayon and wool for best results
Perfect for small parties, family fun and other group activities
Find cool techniques and inspiration at tiedyeyoursummer.com

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
